Reviews.Title: “It takes you back to the 1970s !!!!”
Reviews.Author: chris.lalor
Reviews.Content: business trip customer hotel arrived late night checked easy fuss free double double bed drink outside prices reasonable bathroom throwback hotel built im assuming 1970s hotel door called sol 70 fashioned furniture hotel dark brown including bathroom suite photos didnt eat restuarant night poor breakast breakfast consisted meats yoghurt white bread brown corn flakes coco pops selection sugary pastries amazement wine available breakfast photos ive seen english tourists maybe bottles glasses help yourself terms position hotel accross road beach free municipal car park opposite hotel staff okay exactly fastest trying cup coffee morning art waiter rarely seen grab plus position free parking minus poor wifi tv stations 38 werent spanish id look booking recommend doing
